title: Guidelines of the director
context: [ยง671D-13] Guidelines of the director. The director, in consultation with the director of the department of health, may adopt pursuant to chapter 91, such rules and voluntary guidelines as may assist the professional review bodies in meeting the standards described in section 671D-11(a). [L 1989, c 354, pt of ยง3 and c 363, pt of ยง3]
